name: wtfnode
description: Utility to help find out why Node isn't exiting

scripts.test: (cd tests && node test && node test-eval && node test-promise && node test-promisify && node test-logging && node test-once-flowing && node test-issue-37.js)
scripts.test-sourcemaps: (cd tests && coffee --map --compile test-sourcemaps.coffee && node test-sourcemaps.js || exit 0)

author: Kris Reeves
